name: South Laurel High School
description: South Laurel High School is a public high school serving grades 9-12 in the Laurel County School District. The school provides comprehensive secondary education including academic programs, athletics, extracurricular activities, and student support services. The school offers a full curriculum with advanced placement courses, career and technical education, and special education services. They also provide school counseling, health services, and a Youth Service Center for student support.
source: Verified from official website, multiple online directories, and school district sources
hours_of_operation: Monday-Friday 7:30 AM - 3:30 PM (school hours), closed weekends and holidays
eligibility: Students in grades 9-12 residing in the Laurel County School District
cost_information: Free public education for eligible students
notes: Part of Laurel County Public Schools. Offers breakfast and lunch programs. Has a Youth Service Center that provides additional support services for students and families.
